title: Bang Bang Long Chudong season4
synopsis: The Bangbanglong expedition came to a planet similar to the Mesozoic environment on earth, so start a new adventure here! The first dinosaur discovered was the fat dinosaur Swamp Dragon. The greedy Swamp Dragon thought to help the Dragon Expedition to steal the fruit and want to drive them away. Not even willing to share the fruit with other dinosaurs. One day a storm hit the jungle, but the swamp dragon was reluctant to leave in order to protect the fruit. Can the help dragon expedition rescue the swamp dragon safely in the storm? (translated from bilibili)
